base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with modern style.
part_description: Features one drawer, two doors, and a countertop. The drawer is positioned at the top left, doors below and to the right, with a recessed area on the countertop.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides open and closed on tracks, providing access to its contents. The doors swing outward on hinges, allowing access to the storage space inside. The recessed area on the countertop may serve as a utility space or for additional storage.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, used for storage in kitchens or bathrooms. The countertop provides a surface for placing items or working. Handles on the drawer and doors allow easy access, and the cabinet can be integrated with other furniture or appliances.
